explains: adj. 低调的，不招摇的；（艺术，摄影）低色调的，暗调的

sentences.en: That's very thoughtful of you, Eric, but it will be pretty low-key, nothing flashy.
sentences.cn: 艾瑞克，你想得真周到，不过它将会很低调，不浮华。

sentences.en: Their wedding was a very low-key affair.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚礼办得很低调。

sentences.en: The wedding will be a very low-key affair.
